alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Carbon County through 315 PM MDT... At 223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frannie, or 17 miles northwest of Lovell, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon
